name: Helping Hand

projects.title: Recommendation
projects.description: Unsure about which one to pick? Allow us to help

services.title: Free Tier
services.description: Therapy for free. Interact with the model for a limited amount of times each day with the choice to watch ads to experience nearly a full therapy session per day.

services.title: Entry Tier ($9.99)
services.description: Experience our AI model with full interactivity (including the visualizer) with a restriction on the number of requests to one full therapy session per day. Lacks the ability to train the model to your needs.

services.title: Premium Tier ($19.99)
services.description: Experience all the perks of our entry-level tier, with full interactivity, access to the visualizer, along with training of the model, and infinite requests. Also, enjoy free referrals to nearby therapists in your area.

aboutpara: At Helping Hand, we're revolutionizing mental health support by harnessing the power of Machine Learning Models (MLMs) to offer accessible, affordable, and effective therapy alternatives. Founded by a coalition of mental health professionals, data scientists, and tech innovators, our mission is to make psychological support a universal right, not a privilege. Our platform delivers personalized, adaptive AI-driven therapy that mimics the empathy and effectiveness of traditional therapy but at a fraction of the cost and with greater availability. We aim to break down barriers to mental wellness, providing a confidential, supportive space for anyone to explore their feelings, understand their thoughts, and embark on a journey of healing and self-improvement, anytime, anywhere. Join us in transforming the landscape of mental health care, where innovation meets empathy to empower individuals in taking control of their mental well-being.
